title: Adani Green operationalizes first 250 MW wind capacity at Khavda
description: AdGreen Energy Limited (AGEL) has activated the first 250 MW wind capacity at the world's largest 30,000 MW renewable energy plant in Khavda, Gujarat. This development increases the operational capacity at the Khavda plant to 2,250 MW, solidifying AGEL's leadership with a total operational portfolio of 11,184 MW across India.
